org.webdice.factory
Class DiceFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.webdice.factory.DiceFactory

public class DiceFactory
extends java.lang.Object

The dice factory class will create for AjaxDice a dice based on the number of faces. If the number of faces given is different than 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 and 20, it will return a DICE_UNKNOWN Dice.

Since:
06/14/2010
Author:
Paulo Ortolan
See Also:
The Unknown Dice.

Method Summary
static Dice createDice(int faces)
          Creates a dice using a given number of faces.

Method Detail

createDice

public static Dice createDice(int faces)
Creates a dice using a given number of faces. If the number of faces given is different than 4, 6, 8, 10, 12 and 20, it will return a DICE_UNKNOWN Dice.

Parameters:
faces - The number of faces.
Returns:
The Dice based on the number of faces.
